name: Trash Catcher (Rerun)
description:
Gregory is on a mission to save the ocean. Use your net to pick up trash and raise money by doing so. Use this money to buy upgrades to further pick up more trash. Get to your ultimate goal of $30,000 to buy the "Trash Catcher" robot and win the game!

Made for the 2021 SeaJam

Credits:

Mixkit for audio

LittleRobotSoundFactory on Freesound for audio

Videvo for audio

Art and game made by Rerun
